dialog.delete_account.text: Delete this account. (All items will be permanently deleted.)
dialog.error.invalid_username.message: Username must be between 6 and 30 characters long.
dialog.error.limit.change_password.messa: Password can be changed once a week.
dialog.error.limit.login.message: Too many log in requests. Please try again tomorrow.
dialog.error.limit.signup.message: No more than 3 accounts can be created in one month.
dialog.error.unknown.message: Unknown error. Please check your network connection.
item.conflict.deleted.message: This item is updated remotely and deleted locally.
item.conflict.missing.message: This item is deleted remotely and updated locally.
item.conflict.updated.message: This item is updated both remotely and locally.
list.error.limit.sync.message: Too frequent sync requests. Please try again later.
